ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Labour Standards Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the Canada Labour Standards Regulations to ensure that its continuity of employment provisions are applicable to Reservists under the new Division XV.2 (Leave of Absence for Members of the Reserve Force) of the code.
